articles.description: Lifesaving treatments for people with severe covid-19 are still in short supply, but new results from a large ongoing trial in the UK have found that an existing arthritis drug called tocilizumab can noticeably lower hospitalized patients’ risk of dying, espe…

articles.title: COVID-19 live updates: 7-day, 14-day positivity rate in CA below 5 percent for first time this year - KGO-TV
articles.description: For the first time in few months, the seven- and 14 day- positivity rates in California are below five percent.
